name: Response Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: A playbook to mitigate an incident involving the exploitation of command and scripting interpreters by an attacker.

action--f4bda213-3cab-4d30-a026-3ab15c0f.name: Kill malicious process
action--f4bda213-3cab-4d30-a026-3ab15c0f.description: Terminate any running malicious processes to prevent further damage.

action--589db32e-ef2d-4e19-b92a-55c3d6d0.name: Remove malicious scripts
action--589db32e-ef2d-4e19-b92a-55c3d6d0.description: Delete any malicious scripts identified on the system.

while-condition--b6af5ba1-abd9-46e4-ab46.description: Repeats system scanning until all threats are removed.

action--953c83fa-366c-474f-9b4e-eb9879cd.name: Run a full system scan
action--953c83fa-366c-474f-9b4e-eb9879cd.description: Launch a comprehensive scan of the system for malicious items.
